lom:description.lom:string: "Women in Engineering Programs & Advocates Network (WEPAN) is a national not-for-profit organization with over 600 members from nearly 200 engineering schools, small businesses to Fortune 500 corporations, and non-profit organizations. WEPAN is dedicated to improving the climate for and success of all women in engineering. By transforming environments in institutions of higher education, a diverse population of aspiring engineers can succeed." Keywords: Gender Equity

lom:title.lom:string: Women in Engineering Programs and Advocates Network-Website
